summary: An American-led team of International astronauts leave their space station on the first mission to Mars, but the captain's religious beliefs may get in the way.
cast: Walter Brooke|Eric Fleming|Mickey Shaughnessy|Phil Foster|William Redfield|William Hopper|Benson Fong|Ross Martin|Vito Scotti|John Dennis|Michael Fox|Joan Shawlee|Iphigenie Castiglioni|Dan Barton|Kei Thin Chung|Rosemary Clooney|Don Dunning|Fred Essler|Rand Harper|Maurice Hart|Jack Iversen|Mike Mahoney|John Mansfield|George Marshall Jr.|Neyle Morrow|Harvey Parry|Tom Selden|Richard Shannon|Bob Templeton|David Vaile|Jamieson Ward
keywords: psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|space station|general|colonel
title: La conquista del espacio
